itunes:summary:
Daily Wire co-founder Jeremy Boreing talks about founding the biggest conservative media company in the world with Ben Shapiro, what getting into movies and kids’ TV has been like as a conservative media company, why he and the Daily Wire are happily leaning into the Culture Wars, and how they dominate Facebook and YouTube even though they’re conservative.
